summary: Attempted to test analysis page stability and tab loading functionality. Frontend loads correctly but analysis functionality requires authentication (401 errors). Unable to complete comprehensive tab testing due to authentication barriers.

authentication_issues.impact: Prevents testing of analysis page and tab functionality

authentication_barrier.issue: Registration modal blocks analysis testing without account creation

react_query_configuration.issue: FIXED - retry: false has been correctly added to all useQuery hooks in the 8 tab components

passed_tests: Vite proxy configuration working (console shows proper connection)
Backend API health endpoint responds correctly
React Query retry configuration verified in all tab components
No obvious frontend compilation errors detected

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - UI loads but authentication prevents full testing
success_percentage.backend: 80% - Health check passes, specific endpoints require auth

action_item_for_main_agent: Testing was blocked by authentication requirements. The React Query retry: false fixes are correctly implemented. To complete testing: 1) Either implement a test/demo mode that bypasses authentication, 2) Provide test credentials, or 3) Create public demo analysis pages. The main fix (retry: false in React Query hooks) appears to be correctly implemented based on code review.
